metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1020014 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
docker-credential-helpers before 0.6.3 has a double free in the List functions. Jasiel Spelman discovered that a double free existed in docker-credential-helpers. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1020014` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 18.09.7-0ubuntu1~18.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '18.09.7-0ubuntu1~18.04.4').
